title: The Pretty lady and the electronic musicians
creator_credit: Sam Weiss, Nick Bosustow and Stephen Bosustow Productions
brief_description: An animated modern day fairy tale in which two young electronic musicians court a lady by showing their skills in making electronic musical sounds.
